// Pivot 0, 0
int road[34] = {
	477, 480,
	477, 2505,
	1017, 2514,
	1020, 2017,
	1977, 2020,
	1977, 2514,
	2514, 2520,
	2517, 1980,
	1020, 1977,
	1022, 1020,
	2520, 1017,
	2520, 480,
	2482, 482,
	2477, 977,
	1020, 980,
	1020, 482,
	491, 477
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float road[34] = {
	0.159000f, 0.160000f,
	0.159000f, 0.835000f,
	0.339000f, 0.838000f,
	0.340000f, 0.672333f,
	0.659000f, 0.673333f,
	0.659000f, 0.838000f,
	0.838000f, 0.840000f,
	0.839000f, 0.660000f,
	0.340000f, 0.659000f,
	0.340667f, 0.340000f,
	0.840000f, 0.339000f,
	0.840000f, 0.160000f,
	0.827333f, 0.160667f,
